Base: 12 points at 1.50 factor / 10% fee.
Downsell Rule: Each 0.01 reduction in factor or 1% fee reduction equals –0.5 point in commission.

Minimum Terms (“Hard Floors”): 1.40 factor / 5% fee.

Examples:
1.50 / 10% = 12 points
1.49 / 9% = 11.5 points
1.45 / 10% = 9.5 points
1.40 / 5% = 7.5 points
